about_the_game:
RelicWar is a turn based roleplaying game based in a cyberpunk world. Collect the requested dungeon Relic and escape unharmed. Battle tough dungeon monsters and enemy players along the way. They want to steal your valuable treasure. Run or fight your way out. The choice is yours!

Into the Depths

The year is 2137. You live in "Neo Ampolis" - a city within the continent of Poldova. "Neo Ampolis" is a bustling city under heavy government control. You have offered to help an old friend Gunther to restore his late father's collection of Relics in his pawn shop. He once sold them many years ago. Living day to day in a fast paced cyber world he has one final wish - to fill his Relic Vault full of his fathers Relics before he retires. The dungeons underneath the city contain creatures impacted by the high radiation levels of "Ampolis Ruins" - the city from a bygone era. The government runs operations to collect ore with mining bots to sustain the new world's lack of physical materials and they provide security assistance to ensure business won't be impacted. Help Gunther in his quest to fulfill his fathers last wish. Explore the ruins and on the surface brave the harsh conditions of the snowy wilderness.

Turn Based Gameplay

Starting each match you will have a deck of cards. These will allow you to boost movement, attack or defense. You can set traps to slow your enemies down or use the same cards in your hand during battles to give you that extra edge.

Unique Hunters

Each Hunter has a different background story, principles and weapon for combat. Outside of the dungeons you will need to upgrade them and provide healing for any lasting injuries at the nearby MediCenter. Some Relics you find can be equipped for your next adventure into the dungeons.

Relic Abilities

Gunther is a good friend, knows his Relics well but is also trained in the art of archaeology extraction. Any redeeming qualities of a Relic will be extracted to help your faction of Hunters on their journey to complete his Relic Vault.

Created with real Indie Dev spirit

This game was created with game design and code from the lead dev but in collaboration with passionate indie creators from around the globe. Original soundtrack from a Norwegian rockstar, hand crafted pixel art from an expert level pixel artist, SFX from an experienced indie composer and beautiful illustrations from a wonderful artist. Also shoutout to translators who recently got involved in providing languages other than English.
